TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: "because its poisoned..."

"Dum dum dum dam!"

*Dramatic face
"What areeeee youuuu?"
he is an tentacle monster brony

"That description fit me well, I like it..."

*brohoof

Wait, I don't have hoofs

Um... I didn't order calamari...

Wait, this is an elevator?

Oh I have some, you wnat any?
